titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) هُمُ الْعَلَامَاتُ الَّتِي ذَكَرَهَا اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ فِي كِتَابِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 17 – The Imams<sup>asws</sup>, they<sup>asws</sup> are the Signs which Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic Mentioned in His<sup>azwj</sup> Book

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْآيَاتِ الَّتِي ذَكَرَهَا اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ فِي كِتَابِهِ هُمُ الْأَئِمَّةُ ( عليهم السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 18 – The Signs which Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic Mentioned in His<sup>azwj</sup> Book, they<sup>asws</sup> are the Imams<sup>asws</sup>

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) وُلَاةُ الْأَمْرِ وَ هُمُ النَّاسُ الْمَحْسُودُونَ الَّذِينَ ذَكَرَهُمُ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ
titles.en: Chapter 16 – The Imams<sup>asws</sup> are the Masters of the Command (Wali Al-Amr), and they<sup>asws</sup> are the envied people whom Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic has Mentioned

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) هُمُ الْعَلَامَاتُ الَّتِي ذَكَرَهَا اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ فِي كِتَابِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 17 – The Imams<sup>asws</sup>, they<sup>asws</sup> are the Signs which Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic Mentioned in His<sup>azwj</sup> Book

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (412/ 2)
text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِي دَاوُدَ الْمُسْتَرِقِّ قَالَ حَدَّثَنَا دَاوُدُ الْجَصَّاصُ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ وَ عَلاماتٍ وَ بِالنَّجْمِ هُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ قَالَ النَّجْمُ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) وَ الْعَلَامَاتُ هُمُ الْأَئِمَّةُ ( عليهم السلام )

en.hubeali: Al Husayn Bin Muhammad Al Ashary, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Abu Dawood Al Mustariq who said, ‘Al Dawood Al Jassas narrated to us saying,

‘I heard Abu Abdullahasws saying (with regards to) [16:16] And Signs; and by the star they are being guided. Heasws said: ‘The ‘star’ is Rasool-Allahsaww, and the ‘signs’, theyasws are the Imamsasws’.
en.sarwar: 1. Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad al-Ash‘ari from MuAlia ibn Muhammad from abu Dawud al-Mustariqq who has said that Dawad al-Jassas who has said that he heard Imam abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.) say about the words of Allah, “Through the signs and with the star people do find their way.” (16:16) “Star is the Messenger of Allah (s.a) and the signs are the Imams (a.s.)”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (413/ 2)
text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ أَسْبَاطِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ قَالَ سَأَلَ الْهَيْثَمُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) وَ أَنَا عِنْدَهُ عَنْ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ وَ عَلاماتٍ وَ بِالنَّجْمِ هُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ فَقَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) النَّجْمُ وَ الْعَلَامَاتُ هُمُ الْأَئِمَّةُ ( عليهم السلام ) .

en.hubeali: Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Al Washha, from Asbaat Bin Salim who said,

‘Al-Haysam asked Abu Abdullahasws and I was in hisasws presence, about the Words of Allahazwj Mighty and Majestic [16:16] And Signs; and by the star they are being guided, so heasws said: ‘The ‘star’ and the ‘signs’, they are the Imamsasws’.
en.sarwar: 2. Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad has narrated from MuAlia ibn Muhammad from al-Washsha’ from Asbat ibn Salim who has said that Haythamm asked Imam abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.), while I was there, about the meaning of the words of Allah, “Through the signs and with the star people do find their way.” (16:16) The Imams (a.s.) said, “Star is the Messenger of Allah (s.a) and the signs are the Imams (a.s.)”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف على المشهور - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (413/ 2)
text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْوَشَّاءِ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى وَ عَلاماتٍ وَ بِالنَّجْمِ هُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ قَالَ نَحْنُ الْعَلَامَاتُ وَ النَّجْمُ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) .

en.hubeali: Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Al Washha who said,
‘I asked Al-Rezaasws about the Words of Allahazwj the Exalted [16:16] And Signs; and by the star they are being guided. Heasws said: ‘Weasws are the ‘signs’, and the ‘star’ is Rasool-Allahsaww’.
en.sarwar: 3. Al-Husayn ibn Muhammad has narrated from MuAlia ibn Muhammad from al-Washsha’ who has said that he asked Imam al-Rida (a.s.) about the meaning of the words of Allah, the Most High, “Through the signs and with the star people do find their way.” (16:16) The Imams (a.s.) said, “We are the signs and the messenger of Allah is the star,”
